tika-vin11t40:2: 286. Upasampannaṃ omasato bhikkhussa pācitti hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin11t40:3: 287.Anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayāti codanāparanāmadheyyaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇameva paccayo, tasmā, anuvādanādhikaraṇahetūti attho.
tika-vin11t40:8: 297.Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā pariccajanatthāya katāya yāvatatiyakaṃ samanubhāsanāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ accajantiyā tassā bhikkhuniyā, tassa bhikkhussa ca accajato pācitti hotīti yojanā.
